attributes.action: Ban religious views on civil matters from the BBC
attributes.additional_details:
Census results from 2011 demonstrate that th UK is becoming a humanist / non-religious nation.

The views of organised religious leaders are increasingly irrelevant to the British public & oftentimes represent out-dated extremism.

The BBC is publicly funded & should not promote the views of these dangerous minorities.

This applies to all organised religions equally.

rejection.details: A matter for the BBC, not the Government.
